msgExplanation.p:
There are several possible causes for this error.
The message header that was received by the Message Gateway server is not valid.
For the Message Gateway command line interface (CLI), the request contained properties that is not valid.
If the error is from the Message Gateway client, this is an internal error.

ul.li: Check your network configurations to ensure there are no other applications configured to use the same port.
Ensure that the properties in the message header are valid.
Ensure that the properties for the Message Gateway command line interface are valid.
If the error is from the Message Gateway client, contact IBM support.
